thread.title: Jolly LLB 2 box-office collection Day 9: Akshay Kumar's film needs an airlift this weekend : Bollywood, News - India Today
thread.title_full: Jolly LLB 2 box-office collection Day 9: Akshay Kumar's film needs an airlift this weekend : Bollywood, News - India Today

title: Jolly LLB 2 box-office collection Day 9: Akshay Kumar's film needs an airlift this weekend : Bollywood, News - India Today
text:
Jolly LLB 2 might just make it past the Rs 100-crore mark. For that it will need to earn at least Rs 15 crore this weekend. 
The Akshay Kumar -starrer courtroom comedy film earned a massive Rs 51 crore in its opening weekend. Since then, its box-office collection began to slow down and was at a standstill. For a while, it seemed like it wouldn't be able to be a success on the scale of Airlift or Rustom. 
MOVIE REVIEW: Jolly LLB 2 
Well, Akshay Kumar can relax now, for yesterday, the film crossed the Rs 80-crore mark. 
To earn a minimum Rs 12 crore in the weekend shouldn't be tough. However, The Ghazi Attack has received rave reviews and is expected to give tough competition to Jolly LLB 2 at the box office. 
Here is the complete day by day box-office collection of Jolly LLB 2: 
WEEK 1 
Day 1 (10th Feb, Friday) - Rs 13.20 crore 
Day 2 (11th Feb, Saturday) - Rs 17.31 crore 
Day 3 (12th Feb, Sunday) - Rs 19.95 crore 
Day 4 (13th Feb, Monday) - Rs 7.26 crore 
Day 5 (14th Feb, Tuesday) - Rs 9.07 crore 
Day 6 (15th Feb, Wednesday) - Rs 5.89 crore 
Day 7 (16th Feb, Thursday) - Rs 5.03 crore 
WEEK 2 
Day 8 (17th Feb, Friday) - Rs 4.14 crore 
Total box-office collection of Jolly LLB 2 after nine days: Rs 81.85 crore 
Jolly LLB 2 is the second installment of the Jolly LLB series. The first film released in 2013 and it starred Arshad Warsi and Boman Irani in the lead roles. This time around, the characters of the small-time lawyer Jolly and the big, corrupt lawyer i.e the antagonist, are essayed by Akshay Kumar and Annu Kapoor. 
Saurabh Shukla who won a National Award for Best Supporting Actor for his work in Jolly LLB reprises his role as Justice Sunderlal Tripathi in Jolly LLB 2. 
Interestingly, while Akshay Kumar stars in Jolly LLB 2, the earlier Jolly, Arshad Warsi, also has a film in theatres right now. His eco-thriller Irada featuring Naseeruddin Shah released yesterday.
